title: 100 firefighters tackling blaze at nine-storey building in London's White City
description: About 100 firefighters are battling a blaze in a nine-storey building in London's White City.
content:
About 100 firefighters are battling a blaze in a nine-storey building in London's White City.
Fifteen fire engines are also in attendance at the building on Wood Lane, with the fire affecting floors towards the top of the building, the London Fire Br... [565 chars]

title: Man arrested and dispersal order put in place after flares thrown at The Bell hotel in Epping
description: The local council was this week denied the chance to appeal after its injunction to stop asylum seekers being housed at the hotel was overturned.
content:
A man has been arrested on suspicion of assault after flares were thrown at The Bell hotel in Epping.
Essex Police put a dispersal order in place on Friday night, covering the entire town, until 6am on Saturday.
It gives officers the power to tell pe... [2113 chars]

title: Two arrested as police suspect 'corrupt' council staff allocated 'hundreds of homes for cash'
description: Investigators believe there was blatant advertising on social media offering prospective tenants a means to beat the queue for affordable housing.
content:
Bribes have been used to beat the long waiting lists for affordable homes, according to the City of London Police - which has now launched an investigation into corrupt housing officers.
Two people have been arrested and police say "evidence exists" ... [2531 chars]

title: Crisis engulfs Labour as Angela Rayner is forced to step down as deputy PM
description: Starmer brings forward cabinet reshuffle to restore order but fallout likely to further damage party’s reputation
content:
Keir Starmer is battling to get a grip on the crisis that has engulfed his government, with his deputy prime minister Angela Rayner forced to step down after breaching the ministerial code over her tax arrangements.
The prime minister brought forward... [6078 chars]

title: Alcaraz too strong as he beats Djokovic in straight sets to reach US Open final
description: 22-year-old Spaniard Carlos Alcaraz beat 38-year-old Novak Djokovic 6-4, 7-6 (4), 6-2 to ease into his third successive grand slam final
content: By the final stages of a tense second-set tie-break, Novak Djokovic had left no stone unturned as he tried to cling on. He attempted to serve and volley, he threw in drop shots and vainly tried to take the first strike from his opponent. On more than... [4873 chars]
